game.name: Return of the Obra Dinn
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 항해 중 행방불명, 1803 ~ 상선 오브라 딘 호
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lost at sea 1803 ~ The good ship Obra Dinn.

reviewHighlights.text: i wish i could wipe my memory so i could play it blind again. my mom whos never touched a video game in her life, but enjoys crime fiction, is loving...
It would get a mixed review from me were that an option. I like the art design and there is some good puzzle and story content in there, but ultimatel...
